p.k: New. Cock-a-Doodle-Dead A homeowner is feeling hopeful about the renters who move in next door, but his positivity is short-lived when an act of violence threatens lives
The Killer Nurse At hospitals in New Jersey and Pennsylvania, patients are mysteriously dying. Then a rumour spreads that a serial killer is at work
Doctor Death An English doctor who makes house calls has the bedside manner of a saint for his elderly female patients. But the terrifying truth eventually surfaces
81% Gangland A young man is gunned down at a notorious apartment complex that comes under investigation when a rap video goes viral
81% The Predator Every hour is crucial for sergeant James Dousay when the discovery of a woman's body suggests a depraved serial killer has struck Harris County
Sacrificial Lamb When 13-year-old PJ Grant is found dead from a single gunshot wound to the head, Lt Joe Kenda must determine whether it's suicide or murder
Bad Things Come In Threes Lt Kenda investigates the murder of two young mothers who were gunned down behind a crowded bar. But the case quickly takes a bizarre turn
Maritime Murder Investigators scrutinise a ship full of suspects when a naval officer is poisoned at sea. Which of the many theories surrounding his death is true?
Satanic Homicide Two dead friends, a shrine to the devil and a slogan written in blood points police to a case of Satan worship. But all may not be as it seems
Blood on the Ranch Armed with very few clues, police face an uphill battle to bring 55-year-old jogger Bob Dorotick's killer to justice
For The Love Of Money When a young mother vanished in Hertfordshire, police suspected she'd run off with a lover. So when they found her body
77% Ann Maguire The tragic story of Ann Maguire, who was stabbed to death by a pupil while teaching a Spanish lesson at Corpus Christi Catholic College in Leeds
New. Malcolm Webster The story of a man who murdered his first wife and staged a car crash, attempting to do the same to his second wife - all for life insurance money
Tighten the Screws The death of an Iraq War veteran is investigated
Blood Innocence When a war hero is beaten to death for no apparent reason, Joe Kenda enlists a team of engineers to help him identify the murder weapon and crack the case
An Eye For An Eye When a mother is gunned down in her garage, a host of people emerge as suspects. But it's a life insurance policy that lead police to the killer
81% The Lost Boys Detective John Brown races the clock when an innocent grandma is gunned down in Tulsa. Could teenagers be behind her tragic death?
New. Roadkill A single woman and her daughters are happy when a single man and his daughters move in next door - but a molestation charge
New. Stephen Searle He had an affair with his son's partner - the mother of his grandchild - but it was his wife who paid the final price when he was caught out
Dan Abrams hosts as series two walks you through the most dramatic outbursts and extraordinary moments to ever take place in US courtrooms
Dan Abrams hosts as series two walks you through the most dramatic outbursts and extraordinary moments to ever take place in US courtrooms
Mark Sam Arthur He got the death sentence at just at 18 and claims he murdered to defend an abused woman - but the courts think he had a more sinister motive
